resources.string: SpMp non-release build on $commit $splitand API version $apiver
A graphical instance of SpMp that plays its own audio
A graphical instance of SpMp that relies on an external player for audio
A standalone audio player with no GUI
A tool or script communicating with the server
The server that this client is connected to
Reset all values on this page?
Changes will be applied after the song changes
Long press line to sync by
Press button when this line begins
Lyrics have been manually disabled for this song
Player service isn't connecting A bug may have occurred
An error occurred while calling server command
Start radio at song position in queue
Language used for song and artist titles, etc.
An app restart is required for language and font changes to take effect
When scrolling the view behind the menu, the menu will be moved to a corner instead of being hidden
If an item's title contains any of these keywords, it will be hidden
Displayed on the top bar during playback
Timed lyrics will appear on the top bar if available
Minimum amount of feed rows to load automatically
Rows can also be hidden by long-pressing their title
The now playing menu will open automatically when clicking and playing a song
Disable media item multiselect states once an action is performed
Cancel multiselect once nothing is selected
Instead of playing just the song, its YouTube radio will be added to the queue
Song queue will persist even when closing the app
Songs listened to will be sent to YouTube and added to account history
Playlists contained in the 'Singles' tab on an artist's page will be treated as the contained song, if there is only one
Treat all one-item playlists as singles
Music player will be stopped if the app is cleared from recents
Swipe mini-player down to clear queue
Show repeat and shuffle buttons in player
They will be shown in the queue regardless of this option
By default, triggers on long press
Swap overlay menu long and short press actions
Decrease if queue items are easily removed by accident
Use to increase area for dismiss swipe
Animation mode of the wave border between the queued songs and option buttons
If playback was paused by device disconnection, playback will resume when a Bluetooth audio device is connected
If playback was paused by device disconnection, playback will resume when a wired audio device is connected
Location to use for storing local playlists and songs
Requires restart for change to apply
Window transparency must be enabled for this to take effect
When displaying timed lyrics, scroll to the current line automatically
When scrolling to the current line, position within the view to place the line
Add extra padding above and below lyrics for increased scrolling range
When available, lyrics sync will be displayed per-word instead of per-line
A delay in seconds applied to lyrics sync
An additional delay applied only to lyrics in the top bar
An additional delay applied only while listening with Bluetooth audio
Target audio quality when streaming music
Default audio quality when downloading music
Songs you have listened to at least this many times will be automatically downloaded
Auto-download when on a metered connection
If disabled, listen stats will not be recorded
Song listen count will only be incremented when listened to for at least this long
All recorded stats will be deleted
Use if your system doesn't report the navbar height correctly (requires app restart)
Availability may be limited to certain videos, as loudness data is provided by YouTube
The method to use when manually downloading a song
If true, the default download method will be used immediately when starting a download
When the playing song changes, a JSON post request will be sent to this URL in the following format: `{"youtube_video_id": "<Video ID>"}`
Additional JSON data to be sent to the status webhook
Command to be executed at program start
Requires restart for change to apply
The SpMp server component (SpMs) must be running at the specified port IP address and port. https://github.com/toasterofbread/spmp-server
Command to be run when manually starting the server from within SpMp The first occurence of '$@' will be replaced with the server arguments, otherwise they will be appended to the command
On startup, if a server is not found immediately, a server will be started automatically using the specified command
Strings that have not been localised for the current language
To display information about the current song, use the strings below: - $song - $artist
Also used for the image hover text
Opens the current song on YouTube Music
Opens the project repository on GitHub
Seek through song with number keys
Customise app colours and change accent source
Manage Discord account and customise status appearance
Hide songs and playlists by keyword
Bind keys or mouse buttons to in-app actions

Once logged in, your session cookie will be extracted, stored, and used only for API requests to YouTube Music such as getting your recommended feed and subscribing to artists.
Continue?
Once logged in, your session cookie will be extracted, stored, and used only for API requests to YouTube Music such as getting your recommended feed and subscribing to artists.

You will be directed to an in-app webview in order to log into Discord.
Once logged in, your account token will be extracted, stored, and used only for gateway connections to Discord for setting your current status.
See https://github.com/dead8309/Kizzy for more information.
Continue?

You will be directed to an in-app webview in order to log into Discord.
Once logged in, your account token will be extracted, stored, and used only for gateway connections to Discord for setting your current status.
See https://github.com/dead8309/Kizzy for more information.

SpMp uses the KizzyRPC library to set your Discord account's status. This involves using the Discord Gateway connection, which may be considered a violation of Discord's TOS. However, there are no known cases of user accounts being suspended for this reason. Use at your own risk.
See https://github.com/dead8309/Kizzy for more information.
The Flatpak version of SpMp may require additional setup to use Discord status. See $url if you have issues.
Please restart the application to continue
The connected server's API version ($theirs) doesn't match the API version that this build of SpMp was designed for ($ours). This may cause unexpected behaviour or crashes.

string-array.name: youtube_manual_login_steps
string-array.item: Open the developer console (ctrl+shift+I on most browsers)
Find any POST request to https://music.youtube.com/youtubei/v1/... such as /browse or /account_menu
Right-click the request and select 'Copy' (or 'Copy value') and then 'Copy as cURL (Bash)' to copy the request headers, then paste them below

resources.string: You may need to use a desktop browser to complete these steps

string-array.name: discord_manual_login_steps
string-array.item: Open the developer console (ctrl+shift+I on most browsers)
Find a POST request to https://discord.com/api/v9/... with such as /survey or /player
Copy the 'Authorization' header from the request headers section and enter it below

resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
